title: Do you really think making this game more snowbally is a good idea?
body:
The more you let one or two fed champions become untouchable, the less teamwork matters.  Snowballing is already bad enough in many cases where you can set up a 3v1 pick and still lose 2 of them just to shut down the fed champ.  I don't understand how this is good for a game that is already rewarding solo play and ignoring your team a bit much.  

Yes I know the pros and high level players don't have to worry about snowballing that much, but the rest of us do.

replies.body:
Do you want to actually say how Riot has made the game more snowbally recently or...?

If anything this patch is less snowbally given the losing team now has actually consistent access to Dragon and Baron timers.
Yes. When you're trying to carry your self out and you can ignore stupid team mates and still win. You'll thank me later...
